Package population

Class Individual

java.lang.Object
population.Individual
class Individual extends Object
Represents an individual in a population, with a specific number of planetary systems and patrols. Each individual has a unique ID and maintains lists of planetary systems and patrols. This class supports creating random patrol distributions, changing distributions, and notifying observers.

  • Field Details

    • number_of_planetary_systems

      private int number_of_planetary_systems
      The number of planetary systems associated with this individual.

    • number_of_patrols

      private int number_of_patrols
      The number of patrols associated with this individual.

    • planet_patrol

      private HashMap<Integer,Integer> planet_patrol
      A map associating each planet's ID to the patrol that patrols it. The key is the planet ID and the value is the patrol ID.

    • observers

      private ArrayList<Observer> observers
      A list of observers that monitor changes to this individual.

    • random

      private float random
      A random float value associated with this individual.

    • rand

      Random rand
      An instance of the Random class used for generating random numbers.

    • patrol_list

      private ArrayList<Patrol> patrol_list
      A list of patrol objects associated with this individual.

    • planet_list

      private ArrayList<PlanetarySystem> planet_list
      A list of planetary system objects associated with this individual.

    • cost_matrix

      int[][] cost_matrix
      A cost matrix representing the cost of each patrol for each planetary system. The first dimension represents patrols and the second dimension represents planetary systems.

    • id

      Integer id
      The unique ID of this individual.

    • t_min

      final Float t_min
      The minimum time for comfort level calculation. This value is final and cannot be changed once set.

      number_of_planetary_systems - The number of planetary systems.
      number_of_patrols - The number of patrols.

      public float get_comfort_level()
      Gets the comfort level of this individual. The comfort level is defined as the minimum time divided by the maximum patrol time.

      The comfort level.
